meta._et_pb_old_content:
The box "Phosphenic Pocket Lamp Initiatic + Phosphenic Bulb" includes:
- 1x portable lamp with a "double screen filter" and "two lighting modes".
- 1x charger (110v and 220v).
- 1x user manual (downloadable in your bill).
+ 1x Light bulb (incandescent opaline bulb with) in 220v
